violations.line: if player == computer: print('DRAW!') elif player == 'r' and computer == 's': print('player wins!') elif player == 'r' and computer == 'p': print('player wins!') elif player == 'p' and computer == 'r': print('player wins!') elif player == 'p' and computer == 's': print('player wins!')

fix.before: if player == computer: print('DRAW!') elif player == 'r' and computer == 's': print('player wins!') elif player == 'r' and computer == 'p': print('player wins!') elif player == 'p' and computer == 'r': print('player wins!') elif player == 'p' and computer == 's': print('player wins!')
fix.after: match (player, computer): case (player, computer) if player == computer: print('DRAW!') case ('r', 's') | ('r', 'p') | ('p', 'r') | ('p', 's'): print('player wins!')
